rooms.description: Serves as the welcoming entrance with a foyer that adheres to Vastu principles by ensuring clear visibility and proper light ingress.
Large open space for social gatherings. Features minimalist Brutalist design with raw concrete finish and exposed beams.
Functional kitchen designed in a Brutalist style with utilitarian elements and ample storage. Placement aligns with Vastu guidelines for energy flow.
Adjacent to the kitchen, open layout that encourages family interaction.
A modestly sized room with a private bathroom and closet space, incorporating Vastu recommendations for guest comfort.
Dedicated media room featuring integrated acoustics and lighting designed to enhance cinematic experience. The layout is positioned according to Vastu to avoid negative energy flows.
Dual-car garage with additional storage space beneath if possible, ensuring easy vehicle access and structural stability in a Brutalist manner.

openings.description: Large door to welcome guests with reinforced concrete framing.
Strategically placed for optimal natural light and Vastu compliance. Made of glass panels set in raw concrete surrounds.
Heavy-duty metal door integrated into the structure, maintaining Brutalist aesthetic.

rooms.description: Spacious room with en-suite bathroom and a private balcony. Vastu guidelines ensure the bedroom is located in the northeast corner for prosperity.
A secondary bedroom designed to foster calm and privacy. Adheres to Vastu by situating it near the center of the floor plan.
Shared bathroom for the upper floors, with modern fixtures and sound insulation in line with Brutalist design principles.

openings.description: Provides an outdoor space for relaxation and fresh air. Designed with a glass barrier to maintain open view while ensuring safety.
Uniform design across levels, promoting natural light in line with Vastu principles.

rooms.description: A compact, versatile space ideal for a bachelor pad setup. Includes built-in storage and an open layout that respects both Vastu and Brutalist design aesthetics.
A dedicated workspace with ample natural light. Positioning is in line with Vastu principles to encourage productivity.
Functional space for miscellaneous storage and utility needs, ensuring clutter-free living as per design guidelines.

openings.description: Consistent with other levels to maximize light and maintain aesthetic integrity.
Provides additional outdoor space and privacy for the occupant.
